TopicTitle: need texturer to hepp with russian N1-3L

Articles.Content:
him working on the N1-3L soviet moon rocket. for those who dont know, this was the russians rival rocket to the Saturn 5 launch vehicle. the N1 launch assembly, never got out of the atmosphere, exploding 69 seconds after liftoff at aproximately 12,200 metres. i am recreating this amazing vehicle, but to make this a truly dedicated pack, my texturing skills wont make it to standard.

so im requesting someone with decent texturing skills to make this pack work. i just need texturing, everything else i can do. also the texturer will get the beta\'s of the rocket, and the official download before everyone else!

I have NK-33 model and texture.

BTW, Alchemist working on N1-L3 during long time. He have already made L3 ascend module.
